Constructor Detail

UserPreference

public UserPreference()
Method Detail

getLanguage

public static java.lang.String getLanguage()
Get the preferred language of logged in user. Retrieved from "orclFALanguage" LDAP user profile attribute or FND_LANGUAGE profile option.

Returns:
Preferred language of logged in user

setLanguage

public static void setLanguage(java.lang.String prefValue)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Update the preferred language of logged in user. Saved to FND_LANGUAGE profile option and "orclFALanguage" LDAP user profile attribute. It updates the session as well but session should be synchronized with DB by the caller.

Parameters:
prefValue - - language code
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - Thrown when ID store restrict user from updating his preferences.

getDisplayNameLanguage

public static java.lang.String getDisplayNameLanguage()
Get the preferred language of logged in user for display name from ApplSession.

Returns:
Get the preferred language of logged in user for display name.

setDisplayNameLanguage

public static void setDisplayNameLanguage(java.lang.String prefValue)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Update the preferred language of logged in user for display name. Saved to "orclDisplayNameLanguagePreference" LDAP user profile attribute. It updates the session as well but session should be synchronized with DB by the caller.

Parameters:
prefValue - - display name language code
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - Thrown when ID store restrict user from updating his preferences.

getColorContrast

public static java.lang.String getColorContrast()
Get the preferred color contrast of logged in user from ApplSession.

Returns:
Get the preferred color contrast of logged in user or null if not set

setColorContrast

public static void setColorContrast(java.lang.String prefValue)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Update the preferred color contrast of logged in user. Saved to FND_COLOR_CONTRAST profile option and "orclColorContrast" LDAP user profile attribute. It updates the session as well but session should be synchronized with DB by the caller.

Parameters:
prefValue - - color constrast code - STANDARD, HIGH
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - Thrown when ID store restrict user from updating his preferences.

Parameters:
prefValue - - Accessibility mode - Default, ScreenReader
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - Thrown when ID store restrict user from updating his preferences.
